discourse_list.title: OP Should Focus on NFTs in Subsequent Drop

content.content: OP should promote itself as a smart chain for trading NFTs.  OP should fund projects to allow bridging of NFTs from Eth Main to OP. OP should fund existing values aligned NFT projects to promote bridging their NFTs to OP. OP should fund OP projects that make trading NFTs on OP easier. OP should promote the security and cost savings applicable to shifting NFT marketplace activities to OP. - OP should issue guidance on a future OP drop so that interested users can target OP NFT engagement goals to help support the above.
